job_history.work_description: An Accountant experienced in driving efficiency, productivity, and implementation of process improvements to support achievement of overall corporate goals and objectives.
Responsible for financial management functions including preparation and delivery of monthly/quarterly financial statements, and variance analysis for several cost centers.
Responsible for property and development accounting for several entities which includes preparation financial statements.
Responsible for financial management functions including preparation and delivery of monthly/quarterly financial statements, variance analysis, and financial forecasts.
Responsible for overseeing accounting procedures, internal controls (implementing, monitoring, enhancing), and database management.
Closed and compiled monthly financial reporting packages for management and owners of residential developments.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 20 years of experience in various accounting roles, including Accountant, Accounting Manager, Senior Accountant, and Assistant Controller, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in financial management functions, including preparation and delivery of financial statements, variance analysis, and financial forecasts, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Consistently prepared and delivered monthly/quarterly financial statements, and compiled financial reporting packages, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Internal Controls
skills.explanation: Implemented, monitored, and enhanced internal controls, suggesting strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Responsible for database management, but the extent of experience is not explicitly stated, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held leadership roles, including Accounting Manager and Assistant Controller, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Experienced in driving efficiency and productivity, and implementing process improvements, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Variance Analysis
skills.explanation: Consistently performed variance analysis for several cost centers, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Forecasting
skills.explanation: Responsible for financial forecasting, suggesting strong proficiency in this area.
